meanings.definition: A rare autoimmune disease characterized by the formation of blisters on the skin and mucous membranes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with pemphiguses after noticing the blisters on her skin.
meanings.sent2: Pemphiguses can cause discomfort and pain due to the blisters that form.
meanings.sent3: Despite its fancy name, pemphiguses are no fun with all these blisters!
meanings.sent4: The blisters from pemphiguses seemed like tiny volcanoes erupting on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The image of pemphiguses, with its blisters bursting, stayed in her mind.

meanings.definition: The plural form of pemphigus, a group of blistering autoimmune diseases.
meanings.sent1: The hospital treated many patients with pemphiguses, each suffering from blistering conditions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied different types of pemphiguses to understand their causes better.
meanings.sent3: In the ward, the pemphiguses cases made the doctors scratch their heads.
meanings.sent4: The pemphiguses in the clinic were like a collection of bubble wrap waiting to pop.
meanings.sent5: The variety of pemphiguses in the medical textbooks was overwhelming.
